name: Toxel
description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
abilities.description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.  Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.effect: In battle, this Pokémon cannot use its held item, nor will the item have any passive effect on the battle, positive or negative.  This Pokémon also cannot use fling.  The Speed cut from the iron ball and the effort items (the macho brace, power weight, power bracer, power belt, power lens, power band, and power anklet) is unaffected.  Items that do not directly affect the battle, such as the exp share, the amulet coin, or the soothe bell, work as usual.  All held items work as usual out of battle.  Other moves that use the held item, such as natural gift and switcheroo, work as usual.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
